name: ISLANDERS
description: ISLANDERS is a minimalist strategy game about building cities on colorful islands.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX950 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: We don't really think you need one. Just humming your favorite tune while playing is perfectly fine.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970
